title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
a monster hunter can be found at Sunlit Wetlands.

Not revealing the location of Astarion will earn you his Astarion's approval. If you bring Astarion with you and confront Gandrel again, he will want to fight the monster hunter. Reveal Astarion's name before he does, or refuse to fight will gain his disapproval.

Depending on the sequence of events with the Monster Hunter Gandrel, your journal will be updated and one of the following will be recorded:

We learned that Astarion might be a vampi
